ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We are grateful to the staff of the Laboratoire des Fièvres Hémorragiques en Guinée, namely Mory Cherif, Amadou Doré, Mamadou Alpha Baldé and Aïssatou Sow for their technical support during the field investigation and the differential diagnosis. We also thank the Pasteur Institute of Dakar, regional reference laboratory, for having provided the reagents allowing the yellow fever serology by ELISA.
